channel.title: Chromium on simeononsecurity

item.title: Chromium ADMX Templates
item.description: ChromiumADMX Proper ADMX Template for the Chromium Browser Brave, as a company, has failed to release ADMX templates for the Chromium Browser that may be installed at the same time as the Google Chrome templates. With that in mind, we’ve modified the Google Chrome ADMX templates to reflect the Chromium Browser’s registry path and placed in tandum in the Google ADMX Folder in GPO. These Policy Definitions are in a Pre-Alpha state.
